title: Gemini AI Predicts Stock Markets Better Than Wall Street - Accuracy Shocks Traders

title: AI-cloning of Lara Croft's voice has 'Tomb Raider' fans and actors up in arms
description: In France, the apparent use of artificial intelligence to clone an actor's voice for video game character Lara Croft has fans and actors up in arms
content:
PARIS -- A lifelong fan of “Tomb Raider,” French gamer Romain Bos was on tenterhooks when an update of the popular video game went online in August.
But his excitement quickly turned to anger.
The gamer's ears — and those of other “Tomb Raider" fans ... [4253 chars]

title: Alibaba shares rise over 6% after CEO unveils plans to boost AI spending
description: Alibaba shares surged to their highest point since 2021 after it announced plans to boost spending on artificial intelligence and unveiled new AI products.
content:
Alibaba 's Hong Kong-listed shares surged on Wednesday to reach their highest point since 2021 after the company said it will invest more in artificial intelligence and rolled out new AI products and updates.
